Rules and recommendations for submitting articles to the journal Maxillofacial and Oral Surgeons

The team of the Journal of Diagnostics and Treatment of Oral and Maxillofacial Pathology will be with you at all stages of the publication of your work. The main goal of our work to show the world your unique articles, and to make the process of submission, acceptance and publication for you so simple and easy as it can be.

Send your articles to the managing editor i.i.fesenko@dtjournal.org

Tier 4
